ATTENDANCE / PARTICIPATION AT CONFERENCES,
WORKSHOPS  ETC.
Monthly academic meeting and various guest lectures organized by Baroda
Orthopaedic Association.
Regular case  presentations -twice a week in the department.
Post graduate lecture courses conducted by Gujarat Orthopaedic Association -January
1996 & 1997 at Vadodara, June 1996 at Jamnagar, July 1997 at Ahmedabad,  January
1998 at Jamnagar.
Hands on workshop on spinal surgeries and instrumentation at S SG hospital,
Vadodara in February 1996.
XV Annual conference of Gujarat Orthopaedic association at Rajkot in February
1997.
Attended workshop on interlocking nails –by Baroda Orthopaedic association in June
1997.
Attended 5thfracture fixation course held at LTMG Hospital, Sion, Mumbai in
October, 1997.
Attended basic Illizarov workshop at Ahmedabad conducted by Ahmedabad
Orthopaedic Society –October 1997.
Attended symposium on conservative management of backache –by Dr. Ingalhahikar
& team conducted Bar oda Orthopaedic Association in October 1997.Attended 3rdOrthopaedic P.G. Instructional lecture course (west zone) conducted by
Department of Orthopaedics & Traumatology, Medical College, Indore (M.P.), India
in February, 1998.
Attended XVI C.O.E. (paedia tric orthopaedics) held at Vadodara –conducted by
Baroda Orthopaedic Association –21 st to 24thSeptember, 1998.
Attended WIROC –Basic Spinal workshop –conducted by Bombay Orthopaedic
Society at P.D.Hinduja hospital, Mumbai from 16thto 24thNovember, 1998.
Attended ‘Master trainers’ course for disability management at Vastrappur,
Ahmedabad -23rdto 26thFebruary, 2000.
Attended Micro endoscopic discectomy (MED) technique -lecture + live
demonstration at Bhailal Amin general hospital, Vadodara -8thSeptember, 2000.
Attended 24thSingapore Orthopaedic Association, annual meeting held at Singapore
from 2ndto 5thSeptember, 2001.
Attended ( as reception committee member ) –11thPaediatric orthopaedic conference,
POSICON 2005; organized by Paediatric Ortho paedic Society of India at Vadodara,
Gujarat, India from 27thto 30thJanuary, 2005.
Attended 50thannual conference of Indian Orthopedic Association held at Mumbai
from 25thto 30thDecember 2005.
Ateended Arthroplasty updates and meetings organized by B aroda Orthopaedic
association, Intelligent Hip and Knee course Chennai and other updates in the
country.
Attended Millennium Arthroplasty Conference held at Mumbai on 6thand 7th
September, 2008.
Attended advanced arthroplasty course at Ethicon Institute, Chennai, from 27thto 30th
September, 2008.
Attended International conference organized by Depuy International, `Never stop
moving`-held at Kualalumpur, Malaysia from 12thto 14thJune. 2009.
Attended AO Trauma Principles Course (AO Basic) held at Baroda from 17thto 19th
July,2009.
Attended IGOF(Indo German Orthopaedic Foundation) master`s course on trauma
challenges around knee; arthroplasty & arthroscopy of knee, hip & shoulder held at
Vadodara, Gujarat, India on 31stMarch & 1stApril,2012.
Attended `Socket science` -Revision Hip arthroplasty course at MIOT, Chennai on
27th& 28thAugust, 2012.
Attended 32ndGujarat Orthopaedic Association conference (GOACON 2014) held at
Ahmedabad from 7thto 9thFebruary,2014. (Including pre conference works hop-
cadaveric on pelvi acetabular trauma and CME).
Attended 34thGujarat Orthopaedic Association conference (GOACON 2016) held at
Vadodara from 5thto 7thFebruary, 2016 (Including pre conference workshop on
Modern HTO and CME).
Attended CME on Arthroplasty -Organised under aegis of Indian Arthroplasy
Association -`New frontiers` in Total Hip Arthroplasty, at Vadodara on dt.25th
September, 2016.
Attended CMIC con -2016 (National conference of computer & informatics),
organized by Academy of Pedia trics, Vadodara on dt. 27thNovember, 2016.
MEMBERSHIP
Life member of Indian Medical Association.Life member of Baroda Orthopaedic Association.
Life member of Gujarat Orthopaedic Association.
Life member of Indian Orthopaedic Association .
PAPER PRESENT AION
Presented paper on –Closed intra medullary nailing in forearm bones ( A study of 50 cases) –
in the 24thSingapore Orthopaedic Association, annual meeting held at Singapore from 2ndto
5thSeptember.2001.
FELLOWSHIPS & TRAINING
(1)Did fellowship in A dult reconstruction division, department of Orthopaedic
surgery, National university hospital, Singapore.
(2)Did short term fellowship at Max Institute of Orthopedic& Joint replacement
Surgery, Max Super Speciality Hospital, New Delhi, India.
(3)Did training und er Professor Bae Dae Kyung at Kyung Hee Medical Centre,
Seoul, South Korea –From 17thto 23rdMarch 2007.
(4)Trained at P D Hinduja Hospital, Mumbai for Joint replacement surgeries.
(5)Worked as Assistant Professor in Government Medical college & SSG
Hospital, Vadodara.
(6)
EXPERIENCE  AS ASSISTANT PROFESSOR ANDCONSULTANT
SURGEON
1)Running out patient department.
2)Performing independent surgeries.
3)Handling independently Orthopaedic emergencies.
4)Working as incharge of Physiotherapy departmetnt.
5)Teaching under graduates and post graduates.
6)Guiding post graduates in Research work.
7)Performing Surgeries like –anterolateral decompression, anterior and posterior
fusion, posterior instrumentation, laminectomy & discectomy, osteotomies, ilizarov
ring fixator etc.
8)Performing total hip and knee replacement(Primary and revision) surgeries.
9)Performing limb salvage surgeries(Mega prosthetic reconstruction) for bone
cancers(sarcomas).
10)Performing joint salvage and bone preserving surgeries (like Extra Corporeal
Radiotherapy -ECRT) for malignant bone tumors.
